# Class AbstractNode`Abstract`

Abstract base class for all graph nodes.

Provides common functionality such as ID generation, tracking of internal components, and conversion to a graph configuration node.

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/nodes/builtin/abstract_node.AbstractNode))

  * AbstractNode

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new AbstractNode(props: [AbstractNodeProps](/interfaces/graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps)): [AbstractNode]()

Creates a new `AbstractNode`.

#### Parameters

    * props: [AbstractNodeProps](/interfaces/graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNodeProps)

Node configuration including optional `id` and `reportToClient` flag.

#### Returns [AbstractNode]()

#### Remarks

If no `id` is provided, one will be auto-generated based on the class name. The `reportToClient` flag defaults to `false`.




## Methods

### [TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE]

  * "[TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE]"(): [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Converts this DSL node to a serializable graph configuration node.

Note: This indirection through a symbol preserves encapsulation while still allowing builder utilities to access the conversion.

#### Returns [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)




### `Protected`addComponent

  * addComponent(component: [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)): this

Adds an internal component to this node.

#### Parameters

    * component: [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

The component to attach to this node.

#### Returns this

This node instance.




### `Protected`getFirstComponent

  * getFirstComponent(): [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

Returns the first internal component attached to this node.

#### Returns [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

#### Throws

If no components were added to the node.




### `Protected` `Abstract`toGraphConfigNode

  * toGraphConfigNode(): [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Implemented by subclasses to provide their graph configuration representation.

#### Returns [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)
